languages.text: {n}Джай надолго задумывается.{/n} "А знаете что? Мне ведь и правда нравилась в наших плаваниях вот так, лицом, биться о скалы. Карабкаться по горло в воде и не тонуть. Ощутить привкус свободы... совсем чуть-чуть, самую малость... Но и этого хватило, чтобы мечтать теперь о ней по ночам. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Хладный торг? {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}? В пасть к пустотному кракену! Отныне Джай Хейдари принадлежит лишь себе!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай надолго задумывается.{/n} "А знаете что? Мне ведь и правда нравилась в наших плаваниях вот так, лицом, биться о скалы. Карабкаться по горло в воде и не тонуть. Ощутить привкус свободы... совсем чуть-чуть, самую малость... Но и этого хватило, чтобы мечтать теперь о ней по ночам. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Касбаллика{/g}? Хладный торг? {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g}? В пасть к пустотному кракену! Отныне Джай Жейдари принадлежит лишь себе!"

languages.text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

languages.text: {n}婕伊陷入了长时间的思考。{/n}“你知道吗？我很享受我们的旅程。在这场旅程中，我脸朝下摔在了岩石上，紧紧地抓住漂浮的残骸，被卷入海底，再浮上海面。我品尝到了真正的自由……虽然并不多，只有一点点……但已经足以让我每晚都梦到它了。愿虚空的海怪带走{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}，带走冷市贸易与{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}！从现在起，婕伊·海达利只属于她自己！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊陷入了长时间的思考。{/n}“你知道吗？我很享受我们的旅程。在这场旅程中，我脸朝下摔在了岩石上，紧紧地抓住漂浮的残骸，被卷入海底，再浮上海面。我品尝到了真正的自由……虽然并不多，只有一点点……但已经足以让我每晚都梦到它了。愿虚空的海怪带走{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡{/g}，带走{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港{/g}！从现在起，婕伊·海达利只属于她自己！”{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the Kasballica, the Cold Trade, and Footfall! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

languages.text: {n}Jae se queda soñando despierta un largo rato.{/n} «¿Y sabe qué? Disfruté estrellándome contra las rocas durante el viaje, aferrándome a los restos flotantes, hundirme bajo el agua y volver a ascender. Saborear la auténtica libertad... No mucha, solo un bocadito... pero bastó para hacer que cada noche soñara con ello. ¡Que un kraken del vacío se lleve a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, al Comercio Frío y a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}! ¡De ahora en adelante, Jae Heydari solo pertenece a sí misma!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se queda soñando despierta un largo rato.{/n} «¿Y sabe qué? Disfruté estrellándome contra las rocas durante el viaje, aferrándome a los restos flotantes, hundirme bajo el agua y volver a ascender. Saborear la auténtica libertad... No mucha, solo un bocadito... pero bastó para hacer que cada noche soñara con ello. ¡Que un kraken del vacío se lleve a la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, al {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g} y a {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Paso{/g}! ¡De ahora en adelante, Jae Heydari solo pertenece a sí misma!».{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイはしばらく考え込んでいた。{/n}「それでね。航海中、岩に顔をぶつけたり、漂流物にしがみついたり、海に潜ってまた浮き上がったりするのは楽しかった。本当の自由を味わった…たくさんではなく、ほんの少しだけね…でも、毎晩それを夢見るようになるには十分だった。ヴォイド・クラーケンが、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}、冷たき取引、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}を奪う！これからは、ジェイ・ヘイダリは自分だけのものだ！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイはしばらく考え込んでいた。{/n}「それでね。航海中、岩に顔をぶつけたり、漂流物にしがみついたり、海に潜ってまた浮き上がったりするのは楽しかった。本当の自由を味わった…たくさんではなく、ほんの少しだけね…でも、毎晩それを夢見るようになるには十分だった。ヴォイド・クラーケンが、{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷たき取引{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール{/g}を奪う！これからは、ジェイ・ヘイダリは自分だけのものだ！」

languages.text: {n}Jae hängt eine Weile ihren Gedanken nach.{/n} "Und wisst Ihr was? Es hat Ihr Spaß gemacht, auf unserer Reise mit dem Gesicht gegen die Felsen geschleudert zu werden, mich am Treibgut festzuhalten, unter- und wieder aufzutauchen. Echte Freiheit zu kosten ... Nur ein klein wenig, ein klitzekleines bisschen ... Aber es hat gereicht, um mich jede Nacht davon träumen zu lassen. Möge ein Leerenkrake die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, den Kalthandel und {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} holen! Von nun an gehört Jae Heydari nur noch sich selbst!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae hängt eine Weile ihren Gedanken nach.{/n} "Und wisst Ihr was? Es hat Ihr Spaß gemacht, auf unserer Reise mit dem Gesicht gegen die Felsen geschleudert zu werden, mich am Treibgut festzuhalten, unter- und wieder aufzutauchen. Echte Freiheit zu kosten ... Nur ein klein wenig, ein klitzekleines bisschen ... Aber es hat gereicht, um mich jede Nacht davon träumen zu lassen. Möge ein Leerenkrake die {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, den {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g} holen! Von nun an gehört Jae Heydari nur noch sich selbst!"{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae se perd dans ses pensées pendant un long moment.{/n} « Et vous savez quoi ? Ça ne m'a pas déplu de me fracasser contre les rochers au cours de notre voyage, de lutter pour ne pas couler, de boire la tasse et de remonter à la surface. Parce que j'ai goûté à la liberté, la vraie. Je n'en ai eu qu'un bref aperçu... mais cela a suffi à m'en faire rêver toutes les nuits. Que le kraken du vide emporte la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, le Commerce Froid et {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} ! Dorénavant, Jae Heydari n'appartient plus à personne ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae se perd dans ses pensées pendant un long moment.{/n} « Et vous savez quoi ? Ça ne m'a pas déplu de me fracasser contre les rochers au cours de notre voyage, de lutter pour ne pas couler, de boire la tasse et de remonter à la surface. Parce que j'ai goûté à la liberté, la vraie. Je n'en ai eu qu'un bref aperçu... mais cela a suffi à m'en faire rêver toutes les nuits. Que le kraken du vide emporte la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Castel{/g} ! Dorénavant, Jae Heydari n'appartient plus à personne ! »

languages.text: {n}Jae, uzunca bir süre düşüncelere gömülüyor.{/n} "Bir de biliyor musun? Yolculuğumuz sırasında suratımın kayalara yapışmasından, ayaklarımın altındaki enkaza tutunmaya çalışmaktan, dibe batıp tekrar yüzeye çıkmaktan büyük keyif aldım. Gerçek özgürlüğü tattım. Bir nebze belki, ucundan ama her gece hayalini kurmama yetti de arttı bile. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica'yı{/g} da {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Soğuk Ticaret'i{/g} de uçsuz krakeni yesin! Bundan böyle Jae Heydari sadece kendisine ait!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jae is lost in thought for a long while.{/n} "And you know what? I did enjoy having my face slammed into the rocks during our voyage, clinging to the flotsam, going under the water and bobbing up again. Tasting real freedom... Not a lot, just a little bit... But that was enough to make me start dreaming of it every night. Void kraken take the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}, the Cold Trade, and {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall{/g}! From now on, Jae Heydari belongs to herself alone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae uzunca bir süre düşüncelere gömülüyor.{/n} "Ve biliyor musun? Yolculuğumuz boyunca suratımın kayalara yapışmasından, ayaklarımın altındaki enkaza tutunmaya çalışmaktan, suyun dibine batıp tekrar yüzeye çıkmaktan büyük keyif aldım. Gerçek özgürlüğü tatmaktan. Bir nebze belki, belki küçük bir parça ama her gece hayalini kurmama yetti de attı bile. {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica{/g}'yı da {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Soğuk Ticaret{/g}'i de uçsuz krakeni yesin! Bundan böyle Jae Heydari sadece kendisine ait!"
